## NFTDrop.balanceOf() method

Get the NFT balance of the specified wallet

**Signature:**

```typescript
balanceOf(walletAddress: string, mintAddress: string): Promise<number>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  walletAddress | string | the wallet address to get the balance of |
|  mintAddress | string | the mint address of the NFT to get the balance of |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;number&gt;

the NFT balance

## Example


```jsx
const walletAddress = "..."
const mintAddress = "..."
const balance = await program.balanceOf(walletAddress, mintAddress);
```
